astra.lang

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • astra.core.Module
      • astra.lang.Console

  • public class Console
extends astra.core.Module
    This API provides support for I/O via the Java console. It does this via java.lang.System.in and java.lang.System.out respectively.
    Author:
    Rem Collier

    • Nested Class Summary
